item.title: Useful Stuffs from MA1522
item.description: Life is a linear equation in which you can’t cross multiply! If you think you can do it, you can do it. If you think you can’t do it, you can’t do it (Quote by Israelmore Ayivor)

item.title: CS2100 Common Mistakes Part 1
item.description: We learn from failure, not from success! (Quote by Bram Stoker)
